about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for Camp Sunshine, now you can get your retro horror fix wherever you are!

Tracklisting

Disc One

  • Camp Sunshine Theme (1:45)
  • Alone (2:49)
  • Contentment (3:42)
  • Happy For Now (4:28)
  • Jacob's Loss (3:17)
  • Dust and Dirt (2:23)
  • Malevolence (2:35)
  • Serenity (1:39)
  • Shaman's Theme (2:33)
  • Childlike (3:07)
  • Hidden Away (3:10)
  • Under the Ground (4:32)
  • Main Theme (Extended Mix) (8:40)
  • Something Wicked This Way Comes (3:26)
  • Main Theme (Full Band Mix) (7:22)
  • Ssssh it's a secret (4:19)

Disc Two

  • Dark and Light (2:24)
  • Inside & Outside (1:40)
  • Still Fear (1:25)
  • Still Hope (1:23)
  • Supper Whale (1:50)
  • Living in Interesting Times (2:57)
  • Water (1:21)
  • Are You Dying or What? (1:53)
  • Something is Touching Me (4:05)
  • Followed (3:12)
  • My Blood (2:57)
  • Wrong Move (2:21)
  • Dream Chase (1:37)
  • Devils of Our Past (1:25)
  • MSH D000701 (1:27)
  • Losing Your Stuff (2:15)
  • Perillos Hedurt (1:55)
  • Abandoned (1:22)
  • Merci Plan (1:25)
  • Vin (2:08)
detailed_description:
Support Over The Wall

20% of all sales of the Camp Sunshine OST are donated to Over The Wall, a Charity providing Free & fun camps for children, teenagers & their families living with serious health challenges


About the Game
